page.title: 10The Herts Advertiser
page.content: {The Herts Advertiser}is a local paper. The premises are just down the road in our project area so it is quite important. The newspaper was started by{Alderman {Richard Gibbs}after stamp tax was abolished in{1885.}It is a weekly paper published on{Fridays}and costs {14p.}Nowadays it sells{21,000 copies on average a week. There are{24 full {time journalists and 2 part time. There are{30 people in St. Albans involved in{printing}and{15 in Luton. It only takes one hour to print all the copies, with modern printing technology. I interviewed{Mr. {Richardson, the Editor;}he thinks it is a very good paper. The paper has to be good to compete with several free newspapers distributed in the St. Albans area. {(Continued on Page 11)
